name: HORIZON (itch) (Vaida)
description:
Downloads available below.

Arrow keys/WASD to move, mouse to interact. Headphones strongly recommended.

I had been wanting to do something 3D for a while now.

This is a short game about nothing in particular.

The mac/linux builds have not been tested, apologies for anything that doesn't work I have no idea how to use Unity.

If you're into that stuff, you can pull the source code here.
